errors.error_description: Added unnecessary dependencies (opencv-python and numpy with specific versions) to the installation command that are not required by btrack
Specified outdated and potentially incompatible versions for opencv-python (4.5.2) and numpy (1.19.0) which may conflict with current btrack requirements
correction_candidates: Remove version specifications and let btrack handle its own dependencies
Use pip install btrack[all] to get all optional dependencies
Install with conda-forge channel for better version management
errors.golden_answer: Remove version specifications and let btrack handle its own dependencies
